name: whitelist
description: Automatically kicks connecting players if they aren't in the whitelist. For use with passworded servers.
author: Syringe, Critical Floof

commands.name: /whitelist_add
commands.description: add a user from the whitelist

args.name: username/uuid
args.description: The name or UUID of the player

commands.name: /whitelist_remove
commands.description: removes a user from the whitelist

args.name: username/uuid
args.description: The name or UUID of the player
